name: Holy Horror
description:
Holy Horror tells the story of Lona, a graduating exorcist who decides to drop in on her vampire bros. It’s a little plot heavy, but the choices you make/objects you interact with will genuinely change the trajectory of the game. There’s a lot of optional content that you don’t need to interact with to progress, but have a hunt around because most of it’s pretty fun.

It’s ~20 minutes if you speedrun, about an hour if you try engage with everything/get all the endings.

There are 4 normal endings and 2 hidden endings.

It’s free, but you can pay me in feedback! Please, this is my first game and if I get some helpful criticism, it’ll definitely improve my later products.

If you like my style, and you’d like to work with me on a project you can drop me a suggestion at lycusaberidge@gmail.com. I’m more interested in working with programmers/artists because that’s what I feel my game lacks, but if you’ve got a really cool idea and you’re not sure how to make the dialogue work/plot flow, that’s great too. I like to think dialogue is my strong point – I really had fun making it in this game.
